column1: #text=My friend 's yard needed some more shade to help make it cooler during the summer .
#text=We both decided to plant a tree to help with the problem .
#text=We went to the store and bought a small tree that we could plant and grow .
#text=The next step was to plant it .
#text=We had to dig up a hole in the backyard to plant it in .
#text=We used shovels and a wheelbarrow to pick up the dirt and take it away .
#text=When the hole was good enough , we planted the tree in the hole .
#text=We then made sure to put back some of the dirt around the root and base of the tree to make sure it was secure .
#text=After we were sure the tree was secure , my friend and I watered the area surrounding it to make sure it would grow properly .
#text=We hope that the tree will offer some shade by next summer .
